ygData.subject: Re: Why did you choose to play a paladin?
ygData.msgSnippet: Why? Why not? First there are the game advantages to Paladins: Paladins are great fighters. Paladins get healing spells. Awesome special ability (Lay Hands).
ygData.messageBody:
Why? Why not?

First there are the game advantages to Paladins:
Paladins are great fighters. Paladins get healing spells. Awesome special
ability (Lay Hands). Finally, Verant claims we will get the best magical
weapons.

Now the role-playing advantages:
Paladins are trusted me more people. You get to play the hero, saving people
and dying for a good cause.

The only thing I don't like it that it takes me longer to gain a level. BUT
since people like and trust me as a paladin I find it easier to group and
thus I have actually gained levels faster.

Hort, Dwarven Paladin, Bertoxxulous Server

> Hail all!!!!! This is a question posed to everyone who has subscribed to
> this list. Why did you choose to play a paladin? No matter your reasons,
> share them with us. Hopefully everyone here is mature enough not to flame
> people for their reasons and what not.
